name: Unexpected Weather
description:
You planned your roadtrip to your favourite theme park today, but there was an issue with the forecast. Whoever knows what you'll have to face on your expedition. You quickly find that even the weather doesn't know what it wants to be, constantly switching between sun, rain, and snow. And as if that wasn't crazy enough, there are LITERAL BOULDERS falling out of the SKY.

Instructions

To play, use the A and D keys (or the left and right arrow keys) to move the car left and right. the car wraps around the screen if you go too far, so use that to your advantage. Dodge boulders, which do 20 damage each. if you stay still for long enough, you can start regenerating health.
